pullrequest.title: Example scripts for controlling arms, neck and head

content.raw:
FYI,

I just downloaded the update and tested it using qual_1. The head oscillates left and right once R5 is standing on the ground. I did not test sending any commands to get it to stop. I would expect that the controller would set a default no motion state once it takes over. 

I have already submitted my logs and do not plan to redo them using these changes. Just looking forward to the next level.
